name: D-Side Ultimate Battle of the Universe
name_original: D-Side Ultimate Battle of the Universe
description:
(Created by Team Hot Stuff for University of Portsmouth's Game Jam 2018)

A 2D-Platformer MOBA hybrid created by Joshua Edwards (programming), Jahangir Uddin (programming), Emma Winters (art) and Tom Garner (music).

Game requires 2-4 (Unity 5.0.1 supported) controllers and local players. Only known supported resolution is 1920x1080 (1080p).
